entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
